FuncDef: The display y1731 eth-bn command displays information about ETH-BN packets on the receive end.
CLIs: display y1731 eth-bn md <md-name> ma <ma-name> mep <mep-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MA.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters, hyphens (-) and question marks (?) not supported.

Specifies the ID of a MEP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191.

Specifies the name of an MD.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters, hyphens (-) and question marks (?) not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display y1731 eth-bn md md1 ma ma1 mep 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If routing devices connect to microwave devices and the ETH-BN receiving function is enabled, run the display y1731 eth-bn command to view information about ETH-BN packets on the receive end.
Prerequisites
An MD, MA and MEP have been created using the cfm md, ma, and mep mep-id commands, respectively.
